item.title: Liz add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Liz add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I wish you could have been there for the sun & the rain & the long, hard hills. For the sound of a thousand conversations scattered along the road. For the people laughing & crying & remembering at the end. But, mainly, I wish you could have been there." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Liz add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "For a long time she flew, only when she thought no one else was watching." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Liz add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Liz add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "If you are a dreamer come in If you are a dreamer a wisher a liar A hoper a pray-er a magic-bean-buyer If youre a pretender com sit by my fire For we have some flax golden tales to spin Come in! Come in!" -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Liz add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Liz add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Listen--are you breathing just a little, and calling it a life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Liz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Liz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Black holes are where God divided by zero." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Liz add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious...and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths." -- Walt Disney Company
